Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/13 2:53PM - Now that's how you weekend! The stoke here goes beyond the summit and were ready to keep the energy rolling into Sunday. Tomorrow, we plan on having 74 ways down, 50 of which are scheduled for some quality time with the groomers. Youll find 11 ways up with no anticipated delays. Just in case you missed out on the In a Pickle Rail Jam, our parks team has decided to open up the rails to the public tomorrow! Rest up and check back bright and early for your morning report. Lets Weekend!

The Sun Bowl is now open for lift, lodge and parking access! Sunrise Express will be open and spinning at 8:30AM - there is no early access available at Sunrise this weekend. PLEASE NOTE: Sun Bowls terrain is for expert skiers and riders only, with natural snow coverage, ungroomed conditions and unmarked hazards. All beginner skiers and Riders should stick to the main face of the mountain. Along with that, snowmaking is set to resume shortly with the goal to open Black Bear as soon as possible from the top, Big Ben, tubing, and more Sun Bowl trails. 

Safety Tip: Look uphill and yield while merging.

Ice Skating is now open! Lace up and head to the Mill House skating pond for a day or night of winter fun. Enjoy music and a campfire all while gliding under the stars. Book now to guarantee your place on the ice.

Guided Snowmobile Tours are back! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee your spot.

The Nordic Center is now open for Nordic Skiing and Snowshoeing! Enjoy the peaceful 10km of trails with friends or family.  

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
